de.browser.not.supported: Leider werden die interaktiven Inhalte dieser Visualisierung von Ihrem Browser nicht unterstützt.
de.title: Geldsendungen von Migranten in ihre Heimat

de.details.remittances.title: Geldsendungen von Migranten
de.details.remittances.per-capita.title: pro Migrant
de.details.migrants.title: Migranten
de.details.aid.title: Entwicklungshilfe erhalten
de.sources.remittances.name: Weltbank
de.sources.remittances.info: Alle Beträge sind anhand des Total DAC Deflator auf das Jahr 2011 bezogen inflationsbereinigt.
de.sources.migration.name: Weltbank
de.sources.migration.info: Zahlen werden nur alle zehn Jahre erhoben, die Werte dazwischen wurden linear interpoliert. Für 2011 und 2012 werden die Zahlen von 2010 dargestellt.
de.sources.aid.name: OECD
de.sources.aid.info: In wenigen Fällen kommt im Datensatz aufgrund von Rückzahlungen früher erhaltener Entwicklungshilfekredite ein negatives Jahrestotal vor. Diese werden in der Grafik nicht dargestellt, sondern als 0 gewertet.
de.intro.1.title: The HIV-Tuberculosis Conundrum
de.intro.1.text: The rich get richer, the poor poorer. This is a sad truth even in diseases, none more so than HIV and Tuberculosis. Mycobacterium avium complex (MAC) is a group of bacteria related to tuberculosis. These germs are very common in food, water, and soil. Almost everyone has them in their bodies. If you have a strong immune system, they don't cause problems. But they can cause serious illness in people with HIV, a look at the sub-Saharan states shows us how much this afflicts them
de.intro.2.title: A First-Class Healthcare System
de.intro.2.text: What makes a 1st world healthcare system? Tuberculosis is a good measure of whether a nation's healthcare infrastructure is up to mark on meeting the challenges of timely and quality healthcare. Seemingly, the Western nations leading these indices, especially the social-welfare oriented states of the EU and America
de.intro.3.title: Is there an Efficiency Point?
de.intro.3.text: Is a cradle-to-grave really required? Seemingly, our European neighbours have a 1st class esque healthcare system, but a closer look at Pan-American and Middle-East states shows comparable quality in handling diseases. Which begs the question, is overly excessive investment required in achieving a consumerate level of healthcare?
de.intro.4.title: Explore the data yourself
de.intro.4.text: Now it's time for you to start exploring the data yourself. Click on the countries you're interested in the most and slide along the time axis. For each country, you will see how diseases have affected them since 1990 and how have their governments have responded in terms of their investment into healthcare. The darker the colour, the more afflicted these populations are from these diseases.

en.browser.not.supported: Unfortunately, your browser does not support the interactive features required by this visualization.

en.sources.remittances.name: World Bank
en.sources.remittances.info: All amounts have been inflation adjusted for 2011 based on the total DAC deflator.
en.sources.migration.name: World Bank
en.sources.migration.info: Migrant stocks are recorded only once per decade, for the years in-between, values have been interpolated linearly. For 2011 and 2012, numbers from 2010 as displayed.
en.sources.aid.name: OECD
en.sources.aid.info: In the database, a few cases of negative annual totals occur due to redemption of earlier aid dept. Those values are displayed as 0 in the visualisation.
